titles: To the Right Honourable the Commons of England assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of Sir Nicholas Crisp Knight.
author: Crisp, Nicholas.
notes: A petition requesting the funds necessary to release the petitioner, Nicholas Crisp.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
